language.title: Work languages
language.language: Catalan is my native tongue, and I work with English, Japanese, Spanish and Catalan.
language.service1: English and Japanese to Catalan or Spanish
language.service2: Catalan and Spanish to Japanese (with the help of a native)

field.title: Fields
field.service: I have worked extensively in the following fields: tourism, IT, video games, marketing, and more.

career.title: Education and experience
career.career: I hold a BA in Translation and Interpreting (Universitat Autònoma de Barcelona), and an MA in Tradumatics: Translation Technologies (Universitat Autònoma de Barcelona). I have been working as a professional freelance translator for a decade.
career.experience: These are some of the companies I have been working with:

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: You can contact me via email or DM on Twitter.
